mapper.select: select * from yinxiang order by price
select * from yinxiang where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by price
select * from yinxiang where price < 100 order by price
select * from yinxiang where price >=100 and price <500 order by price
select * from yinxiang where price >=500 and price <1200 order by price
select * from yinxiang where price >=1200 order by price
select * from yinxiang where one like concat('%',#{one},'%') order by price
select * from yinxiang where two like concat('%',#{two},'%') order by price
select * from yinxiang where three like concat('%',#{three},'%') order by price
select * from yinxiang where four like concat('%',#{four},'%') order by price
